data.title: Village of Leicester
data.meta_description: The Village of Leicester is a wonderful little community located in the heart of Livingston County in the Finger Lakes Region of Western New York State.
data.text:
Welcome to the Village of Leicester website. It is our goal to provide easy access to information that would be helpful to residents and others who have interest in our community. We also hope to encourage citizen input by providing an efficient way to communicate with Village Officials and residents. You can always reach me directly on my cell at 585-748-4509.

- Mayor Barry Briffa

Village of Leicester

PO Box 203

52 South Parkway

Leicester NY 14481

Phone: (585) 382-3699

Fax: (585) 382-9145

clerk@villageofleicester.org

OFFICE HOURS

Monday & Friday

8:00 am - 2:00 pm

For your convenience a secure payment drop box is located by the front door.

IN-OFFICE PAYMENTS ONLY

with2.65% transaction fee

or $3 minimum fee

Get Community Information Quicky!

Lead Line Survey

Lead Line Survey

Help the Village conduct an inventory of service lines for all Village of Leicester Water Customers.

INFORMATION ABOUT THE SURVEY and the dangers of lead service lines can be found: Here

ONLINE SURVEY form and information on how to identify your service pipe type can be found: Here

â€‹

News & Events

INCREASE PENALITIES ON LATE WATER BILLS

At the September 18, 2023 board meeting the Village Board of Trustees voted to increase the penalties on unpaid water bills the new penalty rates are:

10% 30 days past due

25% 60 days past due

LEAF & BRUSH PICK-UP

No large branches or trees will be picked up.

Curb-side pick-up 1st & 3rd Mondays

(Tuesday pickup if Monday is holiday)

ALL WEEDS & LEAVES MUST BE IN BROWN BAGS!

Click Here for Pick-Up Guidelines

NEWSLETTER

Click Here for Spring 2024 Newsletter

A LETTER FROM TOWN HISTORIAN

Oh, the Traffic!

SIGNS ON VILLAGE PROPERTY

Reminder... LOCAL LAW #2-2018 prohibits any and all signs (INCLUDES YARD SALE SIGNS) to be placed on Village property (INCLUDES THE VILLAGE PARK).

FREE SMOKE DETECTOR CAMPAIGN

The Leicester Fire Company with the support of the American Red Cross is offering FREEsmoke alarms to residents in need and providing fire preparedness education for the community. Click here to learn more.

SIGN UP FOR IMPORTANT ALERTS

www.co.livingston.state.ny.us Click on the 'Notify Me' button and follow the onscreen instructions.
